```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
# Read in the data
df <- read.csv("HI_State_Ignitions_All.csv")

# Only select data associated with Kauai
df <- df %>%
  filter(County == "Kauai")
```
```{r}
df$Date <- paste(df$Year, df$Month, df$Day, sep = "-")
df <- df[, !names(df) %in% c("Day", "Month", "Year")]
df <- df[, c("Date", setdiff(names(df), "Date"))]
df$Date <- as.Date(df$Date, format = "%Y-%m-%d")
df$Date <- df$Date - 1
```
```{r}
write.csv(df, "Kauai Data.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
```{r}
# Read the first row (variable names)
headers <- read.csv("PHBK.2020-12-31.csv", nrows = 1, header = FALSE)
# Read the second row (units)
units <- read.csv("PHBK.2020-12-31.csv", skip = 1, nrows = 1, header = FALSE)

# Combine headers and units
new_headers <- paste(headers, "(", units, ")")

# Read the actual data with new combined headers
df_phbk <- read.csv("PHBK.2020-12-31.csv", skip = 2, col.names = new_headers)
```
```{r}
glimpse(df_phbk)
colSums(is.na(df_phbk))
```
